channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: HP’s 15.6-inch Ultrabook with 16GB RAM and one-year Microsoft 365 Personal subscription is under $350 on Amazon - save $200 for a limited time
item.description: HP 15.6-inch Ultrabook with 16GB of RAM and a one-year Microsoft 365 Personal subscription is $200 off at Amazon, now just $349.99.

item.title: Apple’s Xcode adds OpenAI and Anthropic’s coding agents
item.description: Apple is building OpenAI and Anthropic's AI-powered coding agents directly into Xcode. New integrations in Xcode 26.3 will give developers the ability to call upon Anthropic's Claude Agent and OpenAI's Codex to write and edit code, update project settings, search documentation, and more. Xcode is the software developers can use to create and test apps […]...

item.title: 2026 plans: What’s next for Startup Battlefield 200
item.description: See what to expect for Startup Battlefield 200 in 2026, the ultimate startup pitch competition on the global stage at TechCrunch Disrupt. Join the mailing list to be the first to know when applications drop.

item.title: L’écran gaming incurvé Samsung Odyssey G5 de 34 pouces revient à moins de 245 € avec ce code promo
item.description: Le Samsung Odyssey G5 se démarque avec une dalle incurvée de 34 pouces qui va vous proposer une toute nouvelle immersion dans vos jeux favoris. Chez Cdiscount, il tombe à 244,99 euros avec un code promo.

item.title: Homeland Security is trying to force tech companies to hand over data about Trump critics
item.description: The use of administrative subpoenas, which are not subject to judicial oversight, are used to demand a wealth of information from tech companies, including the owners of anonymous online accounts documenting ICE operations.

item.title: CDC Refuses to Take Blame for Measles Spiraling out of Control
item.description: In a WSJ editorial this week, CDC principal deputy director Ralph Abraham tried to push back against criticism.

item.description: Moltbook leaked email addresses and private messages.

item.title: Skyryse lands another $300M to make flying, even helicopters, simple and safe
item.description: Skyrsye, now valued at $1.15 billion, is pushing to get FAA certification for its universal operating system for flight.

item.title: It’s Monster on Monster on Monster in the New ‘Monarch’ Season 2 Trailer
item.description: 'Monarch: Legacy of Monsters' introduces a terrifying new Titan to share the screen with our old pals King Kong and Godzilla when it returns February 27.

item.title: Monarch: Legacy of Monsters season 2’s official trailer reveals more of Titan X, and it looks a lot like Kong’s last rival in Netflix’s Monsterverse TV series
item.description: Apple TV has unveiled the official trailer for Monarch: Legacy of Monsters season 2, and it’s a rip-roaring preview that threatens to tear your screen in two.

item.title: Monarch: Legacy of Monsters introduces a titan thats bigger than Godzilla and Kong
item.description: "Monarch: Legacy of Monsters" returns to Apple TV on Feb. 27, and it's bringing the terrifying Titan X with it.

item.title: Fitbit founders launch Luffu, a way to integrate your family's health data
item.description: Fitbit's founders have a new startup. Two years after leaving Google, James Park and Eric Friedman announced a new platform that shifts the focus from the individual to the family. They say the Luffu mobile app "uses AI quietly in the background" to collect and organize family health information."At Fitbit, we focused on personal health — but after Fitbit, health for me became bigger than just thinking about myself," Park said in a press release. The app is particularly focused on the "CEO of the family" — the person who manages appointments, prescriptions and other health-related tasks.But t...

item.title: Are the monks in D.C. yet? Walk for peace is entering the home stretch: How to follow them on their final route
item.description: Thousands of miles and millions of social media followers later, the internet’s most famous Buddhist monks will soon come to the end of their journey. The internet-famous monks that have captured the attention of the world on their cross-country “walk for peace” are in the final stretch of their 2,300-mile journey.

item.title: Copilot : malgré des investissements massifs, personne (ou presque) ne veut payer pour l’IA de Microsoft
item.description: Copilot n'aurait pas la rentabilité espérée par Microsoft alors que la part d'utilisateurs payants de son IA reste encore tout à fait minime.

item.title: Share the love of reading with $50 off a Kindle Paperwhite 2-pack

item.title: Canon's latest PowerShot proves the compact camera isn't dead — and testing it reminded me why I got into photography in the first place
item.description: The Canon PowerShot Elph 360 HS A / Ixus 285 HS A appeals to the neo-retro appetite of the Tik Tok generation and it's helping to keep compact cameras alive

item.title: Disney theme parks are taking a hit as international tourists skip the U.S.
item.description: The entertainment giant’s stock hasn’t recovered after plunging on its first-quarter 2026 earnings report, despite naming a new CEO. Disney earnings are out, and by the looks of it, the entertainment giant is starting 2026 with some strong points in its first-quarter report, powered in part by two big hits at the box office. However, some disappointing news looking ahead to the second quarter may have spooked investors, causing shares of the stock to slide over 7% to $104.72 in afternoon trading on Monday....

item.title: U.S. trade partners strike deals with each other to shield themselves from Trump
item.description: The most eye-opening deal so far has been the pact announced last week between the 27-country EU and India. Bullied and buffeted by President Donald Trump’s tariffs for the past year, America’s longstanding allies are desperately seeking ways to shield themselves from the president’s impulsive wrath.

item.title: Whats the Minions drama at the 2026 Winter Olympics?
item.description: Spanish figure skater Tomàs-Llorenç Guarino Sabaté's Minions short program routine was almost blocked over copyright issues, until the internet stepped in.

item.title: Gradient’s heat pumps get new smarts to enable old-building retrofits
item.description: Gradient's heat pumps fit in windows, minimizing installation times. Now, it is introducing software to make those units more intelligent.

item.title: The tiny-but-mighty Minisforum MS-01 is a "small form factor dream" that tackles big workloads — and it's just $775 for a limited time
item.description: Minisforum MS-01 mini PC is powered by Intel’s Core i5-12600H, with 32GB of DDR5 memory and a 1TB SSD, and is currently priced at just $775 at Newegg.

item.title: Is Lead Exposure Really Declining? A Century of Hair Holds the Answer

item.title: Sony's WH-1000XM6 headphones are down to a record-low price
item.description:
Sony's wireless WH-1000XM6 headphones are on sale for $398 via Amazon. This is a record-low price, as it drops $62 from the price tag. The sale applies to all three colorways. These easily topped our list of the best wireless headphones. They are, in a word, fantastic. The headphones are packed with premium features, like advanced ANC. There are a whopping 12 ANC microphones throughout and a brand-new chip to power the feature. The end result? It successfully blocks background noise at medium and high frequencies, including the human voice.
The sound quality is extremely pleasing to the ear...

item.title: Watch Club is producing short video dramas and building a social network around them
item.description: Watch Club will house microdramas and fan discussions in the same app, creating a fandom-focused social media experience.

item.title: Republicans Are All In on Boosting Fraud Allegations in California
item.description: Right-wing influencers who were instrumental in spreading allegations of fraud in Minnesota ahead of ICE’s surge are now going after a number of California’s social welfare programs.

item.title: No, Ubisoft did actually announce The Division: Definitive Edition but no one saw it, and it's not a remake or remaster like fans expected
item.description: Ubisoft has released Tom Clancy's The Division: Definitive Edition for PlayStation, Xbox, and PC, after advertisements for the game leaked last month.

item.description: Les représentants de Solidaires Informatique ont exprimé clairement leur souhait de voir le patron d'Ubisoft quitter ses fonctions.

item.title: FUBO reverse stock split: FuboTV makes a rare move, streamer’s share price plunges 25%
item.description: The streaming service reported a net loss of $19 million in its Q1 2026 earnings results, and said the stock split would take place later this quarter. Shares in the sports streaming service FuboTV Inc. (NYSE: FUBO) are currently plunging in Tuesday trading. The stock price drop comes after the streamer reported its Q1 2026 results—and announced a relatively rare reverse stock split. Here’s what you need to know....

item.title: Lotus Health nabs $35M for AI doctor that sees patients for free
item.description: This AI doctor is licensed in all 50 states, the startup says. The deal was led by CRV and Kleiner Perkins.

item.title: Le bug du Patch Tuesday qui empêche certains PC Windows 11 de s’éteindre se propage à Windows 10
item.description: La première mise à jour de l’année de Windows a créé des problèmes en cascade chez les utilisateurs. Après avoir touché principalement les machines sous Windows 11, le bug qui empêche les machines de s’éteindre s’étend à présent aux PC sous Windows 10.

item.title: 3 things you need to know before giving financial gifts
item.description: Things can also get tricky if you want your financial gift to go toward an investment account for someone else. If you have gifting to loved ones on your mind, here are some considerations related to taxes and logistics.

item.title: French police raid X’s Paris office as UK investigation continues
item.description: A raid on X's Paris office was carried out by the Paris prosecutor's cybercrime unit on Tuesday with Europol and French police as part of an ongoing investigation that expanded in July to include Grok. As previously reported by Reuters, Elon Musk and former X CEO Linda Yaccarino were also summoned for hearings in April. […]
